sentences: Mõnes linnas on kevad juba täis kasvule.
Ta elab mõnes väikeses külas Eestimaal.
context: The word 'mõnes' is an Estonian partitive case form of the pronoun 'mõni', which means 'some'. It indicates that something exists or happens in certain places, among certain things, or with certain people. The partitive case here suggests an indefinite quantity - not all places, not all things, but some specific ones.
